linesOfText.text: When I wake up, I like to move my
whole body before I start my day
by mimicking animals I have seen...
I stand up tall like a giraffe,
I slowly glide them down to my side,
soaring like an eagle through the sky.
then use my hands as fins to swim like a fish.
run as fast as a cheetah
I hop around it like a bunny,
until I stop on all fours...
looking for a bone in a deep hole.
I bring my knees to the ground,
and sink my back in like an old mule.
Then I arch it up like a cat,
who's scared of its own shadow.
I lean back on my heels
and stretch my arms out long like an octopus...
and I look like a skunk
I slither my whole body to the ground,
and lie like a snake basking in the sun.
Then I lift my head and arms up and imagine
I'm a seal balancing a ball on the tip of my nose.
the "buzz" of a bee I hear?
No, it's my mother calling me!
